title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4031.2 - Exemption from penalties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4031.2 - Exemption from penalties

State Regulations

When winners of claiming races are exempted from
penalties, the exemption does not apply to races in which any of the horses
running are not to be claimed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4031.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
